ygData.subject: Re: Burned out Lighstones, Quest? was Re: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: Burned out lightstones are for magician research. My friend says they are a real hassle since you have to combine me with other non stackable components. That
ygData.messageBody:
Burned out lightstones are for magician research. My friend says they are a
real hassle since you have to combine me with other non stackable
components.
That and he now has a sizable collection of G Lightstones, can never find em
when looking for em, tons when you dont need em =)

Kragan

>Don't you think that the Burned Out Lightstones are NO DROP
>like any other NO DROP Items that are Quest related? Although
>I don't know and I'm not sure, I think there is a Quest for them.
